name: Vrunal V Mhatre
tagline: Computer Science at Clemson University, Fall 2016
body:
### 3D Game Development Project
This space is reserved for my upcoming Projects and assignments which would be developed under the guidance of Dr. Sophie Joerg. 

### Project Overview
I am interested in making a role playing game. Entire theme of the game would be surrounded around a character played by a Protagonist, who would try to evade and destroy the antagonist to reach a certain goal to complete the game.  

### Game Logic
I look forward to delve into game development features like Waypoint, Navmesh spatial position triggering along with trying Pathfinding technologies for enemy scripting. Although, I haven't tried AI scripts in any games yet, this project could be a first in trying out new process of game development.

### Level Design
Needs to be sketched thoroughly. Would be updating this space regularly.

____

### Assignments 
  1.  [Assignment 1](https://fd541fc0c704e0136edd192f1ec8a0ef1970748b.googledrive.com/host/0ByF97F7OFu5IbFNEWnhrQ0d2WGs/)(https://github.com/vrunal/graduateStudy/blob/master/Builds/index.html)
Please use the download.zip link on this webpage to download all the resources of the game demo. Use the index.html to run it on Firefox.
